title: Buenos Aires Times | Aníbal Fernández: ‘I understand and share the president’s view on re-election’
snippet: He did not do this driven by adversity ... what he believes and what he did. Now he must serve out his term until December 10 having resolved most things within the margin of his possibilities....

title: "El daño es superlativo": Aníbal Fernández llamó a "levantar la voz" contra el Gobierno POLÍTICA El Intransigente
snippet: Fernández vinculó su largo proceso a una «persecución macrista» con «causas armadas» para «ensuciar gente», apuntando contra la denunciante Graciela Ocaña. El exministro defendió su accionar en FPT.

title: Hoy se conoce la sentencia de Fútbol Para Todos: Aníbal Fernández y Capitanich, complicados POLÍTICA El Intransigente
snippet: Hoy saldrá un fallo muy importante: el Trib Oral Federal 1 dictará sentencia en la causa “Fútbol para Todos”. El Fiscal Osorio pidió 3 años de prisión para Aníbal Fernández y 8 meses para Jorge Capitanich pic.twitter.com/2xdD6hqPYt— ...

title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Aníbal Domingo Fernández (born January 9, 1957) is an Argentine Justicialist Party politician, lawyer, and certified public accountant. Throughout his career, he has remained a close ally to the former Presidents Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner.
